abstract: Many Clouds wins Grand National jumps race, making Leighton Aspell the first jockey in 61 years to win race back-to-back; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Leighton Aspell became the first jockey in 61 years to win back-to-back Grand Nationals on different horses by riding Many Clouds to victory in the world’s most grueling jumps race.
snippet: Leighton Aspell became the first jockey in 61 years to win back-to-back Grand Nationals on different horses by riding Many Clouds to victory in the world’s most grueling jumps race.
